fields.name: Consume Soul:
fields.value: You start with 2 souls. If you die ~~at night~~ *by any means except jailor execution*, you will consume 1 soul to revive.

fields.name: Icy Touch (Day):
fields.value:
Consume 2 souls to silence a player and block their voting for the day.
- Often nicknamed "Chill" by players.

fields.name: Gather Darkness (Day):
fields.value: Consume 2 souls to make Reap ~~bypass death immunity~~ *deal Powerful Attacks* tonight. Can not be cancelled once used.

fields.name: Reap (Night):
fields.value:
Reap the soul of target player, killing them and leaving an empty body for 1 day.
- Unhealable.

fields.name: Circle of Death (Night):
fields.value: Consume 1 soul to attack everyone visiting target player.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Consume Soul triggers on *any* death, except against Jailor-type roles, such as the Prince.
